SENT.plain: A twenty-two-year-old student with hypoplastic anemia was treated with large doses of anabolic steroid hormone preparations for two months
Cerebral hemorrhagic infarction shown by CAT scan developed when his hematologic conditions were improving
In treating hypoplastic anemia with anabolic steroid hormone preparations, one should be aware of the possible development of cerebral hemorrhagic infarction at the time of hematologic improvement
